sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 這些傳統學科以及竹製武器的使用一直延續至今。

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活動的延續。

sentences.english: Our thinking is of the Fred Flintstone vintage, hence the Chinese blow us away.
sentences.chinese: 我們的思維是弗雷德是延續，因此中國任意打擊我們。

sentences.english: We recommend continuance of this program.
sentences.chinese: 我們推薦的延續，這一計劃。

sentences.english: The meeting droned on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 會議單調地延續了幾個小時。

sentences.english: The test will be whether they can continue that streak.
sentences.chinese: 但能否延續這一強勁勢頭是他們所面臨的考驗。

sentences.english: This feudal society, beginning with Zhou and Qin Dynasties. lasted about 3000 years.
sentences.chinese: 這個封建社會，從周秦開始，延續了約三千年。

sentences.english: Polar mesospheric clouds appear as light blue ribbons extending across the top of the image.
sentences.chinese: 極地雲層出現淡藍色的色帶一直延續到圖片的頂端。

sentences.english: Me, Forever will also belong to our story extension go down.
sentences.chinese: 涐，永逺亦將屬箊涐們旳故亊延續落去。

sentences.english: To what extent did the Bolsheviks simply continue policies that the tsarist government was already embracing?
sentences.chinese: 布爾什維克延續俄帝政府固有的政策到怎樣的程度？

sentences.english: Contemporary Calvinists may sometimes be responsible for perpetuating this image.
sentences.chinese: 當代的加爾文派也許要爲延續這種印象負責。

sentences.english: Movie gradation Cist the development and transformation of movie examination.
sentences.chinese: 分級制是電影審查制的延續和變型。

sentences.english: Mystical bloodlines are only important when continuing a dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 血統只在延續朝代的時候起作用。

sentences.english: I want to know your feeling about the original song "Bressanone".
sentences.chinese: 所以我決定做這首新歌來延續佈列瑟農的故事。

sentences.english: It shows how the formatting gets carried down to the next paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 它說明了格式如何延續到下一個段落。

sentences.english: The letter continues a legal battle between Mr. Harder and Gawker.
sentences.chinese: 這封信延續了哈德與高客之間的法律爭鬥。

definition: to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to transmit/to pass on to sb else/(math.) transitive
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
